briefDescription: MISSION:To provide access to state-of-the-art Tertiary Intensive& Emergency Medical Care for under privileged children.To promote preventive child healthcare and bring about awareness of good health practices through focused research on physical and mental health determinants by using Standard Pediatric Protocols.VISION:To ensure a future healthy generation for a healthy nation
